# AI Context Map

This document indexes all AI helper files in the homekube repository.

---

## Primary AI Instructions

**`.github/copilot-instructions.md`**
Main instructions file read automatically by GitHub Copilot, defining cluster architecture, component versions, and coding standards for the homekube infrastructure.

---

## Infrastructure Reference

**`AI-CONTEXT.md`**
Comprehensive source of truth documenting non-negotiable architectural decisions, network topology, storage configuration, and operational procedures for the Kubernetes cluster.

**`PRD.md`**
Product requirements document defining project goals, feature roadmap, technical architecture rationale, and success criteria for the homekube automation framework.

---

## AI Skills Library

**`.ai-skills/README.md`**
Overview of the multi-layered AI support architecture explaining how different context files work together to optimise AI assistance.

**`.ai-skills/shell-scripting.md`**
Coding patterns for writing idempotent, cluster-aware shell scripts with proper error handling and validation.

**`.ai-skills/ansible.md`**
Best practices for Ansible playbooks including variable hierarchy, module selection, handler usage, and testing strategies.

**`.ai-skills/kubernetes-manifests.md`**
Guidelines for writing Kubernetes YAML manifests covering namespaces, resource limits, storage classes, labels, and security policies.

---
